name: hsl_to_rgb
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool convexity.
Tool description: Convexity is an Color-convertor API that offers endpoints for converting between different color representations, including RGB, HSL, and CMYK
API description: Converts HSL color values to RGB color values using an external API.

s.description: Saturation component of the HSL color value (0-100).

h.description: Hue component of the HSL color value (0-360).

l.description: Lightness component of the HSL color value (0-100).
